name: Ley Line Disorder: Dire Perseverance
description: Grant the character to which this is attached 2 Shield points. (Can stack. Max 4 points.)
descriptionraw: Grant the character to which this is attached <color=#FFFFFFFF>2 $[K6] points</color>. (Can stack. Max 4 points.)
descriptionreplaced: Grant the character to which this is attached <color=#FFFFFFFF>2 {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> points</color>. (Can stack. Max 4 points.)
